attributes.action: Remove ALL Russian products from shops and are stopping trading with Russia.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s more than week of the war in Ukraine, thousands people already killed!!! To continue the war Russia Federation needs money. Every person in the world understands that.  Removing All Russia products and are stopping trading with Russia and their suppliers will help to stop this bloody killing of innocent people.
GLORY TO UKRAINE
attributes.background: Remove ALL Russian products from shops and OFFICIALLY confirm that they are stopping trading with Russia and their suppliers.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457

Deciding whether to suspend operations in Russia is a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
